subject: Order not completed
description_text:
Ordered a handful of thing from you guys and only received the pedal set
and shifter. Haven't received the quick release or hand break.

conversations.body_text: Hi Beyond Just Builds,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Since your original tracking link has not been updated, we have arranged for a reshipment. Here is your new tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047240923161,SF6047240923286
